summary.what: Tighten why coaching to differentiate from notes
summary.why: Now that notes exists, why coaching must explicitly say 'verdict here, journey in notes' to prevent field confusion. Without differentiation, agents would put journey content in why.
summary.how: Added BAD example for journey-in-why, changed framing from 'design decisions' to 'the verdict', updated closing question to point at --notes for elaboration.
